title: Jhin and Nunu R is not working
body:
Hello, Riot. I want to tell you that I had problems with Nunu and Jhin ult. Every time I used Jhin R I can't fire bullets, it just won't fire bullets! Also, Nunu R cannot be stopped. Every time I used it, I can't stop it and deal damage, I need to wait whole charge ( as you probably know, for 3 seconds, R activates circle that will explode and deal damage to nearby enemies and slow them ).  Can you help me please???



P. S. Sorry for bad English, I am not a English native speaker. {{champion:20}} {{champion:202}}

replies.body:
Jhin R is just repeated presses of R. It sounds like maybe your R key is jammed, or you are using a macro/script that is blocking repeated rapid presses of R. 
Have you tried rebinding ult to another key?
I believe Nunu can only cancel his ult if you put in a move command.  I haven't played Jhin so I don't know how the commands for his ult work.
